headline: Citigroup Announces $3.5 Billion Redemption of 3.106% Fixed Rate/Floating Rate Notes Due 2026
summary: NEW YORK, April 03, 2025--Citigroup Inc. is announcing the redemption, in whole, constituting $3,500,000,000 of its 3.106% Fixed Rate / Floating Rate Notes due 2026 (the "notes") (ISIN: US172967MQ12).

raw.headline: Citigroup Announces $3.5 Billion Redemption of 3.106% Fixed Rate/Floating Rate Notes Due 2026
raw.summary: NEW YORK, April 03, 2025--Citigroup Inc. is announcing the redemption, in whole, constituting $3,500,000,000 of its 3.106% Fixed Rate / Floating Rate Notes due 2026 (the "notes") (ISIN: US172967MQ12).

headline: Stocks of Wall Street giants plunge as Trump tariff turmoil roils the finance world
summary: Stocks of the biggest banks and private-equity firms plunged Thursday as concerns mounted about how Wall Street giants and their customers might be affected by heightened odds of a US recession.

raw.headline: Stocks of Wall Street giants plunge as Trump tariff turmoil roils the finance world
raw.summary: Stocks of the biggest banks and private-equity firms plunged Thursday as concerns mounted about how Wall Street giants and their customers might be affected by heightened odds of a US recession.

headline: Citigroup Is Still A Mess: But Maybe That's The Opportunity
summary: Citigroup trades at 0.79x tangible book value. Discover why C's restructuring plan and low valuation present a 'Buy' opportunity for long-term investors.

raw.headline: Citigroup Is Still A Mess: But Maybe That's The Opportunity

headline: Trump Tariffs Wipe Out Nearly $2 Trillion From US Stock Market

headline: US 10-Year Yield Drops Below 4% for First Time Since Trump Won

headline: Citi reshuffles U.S. retail stock ratings after reciprocal tariff announcement
summary: Investing.com -- Citi has made a series of rating adjustments across U.S. retail stocks, reacting to a shifting macro backdrop marked by higher tariffs and rising recession risks.

headline: Judge tosses racial bias suit against Citi over ATM fee waivers
summary: The lawsuit accused the New York City-based bank of “unabashed racial discrimination” for waiving ATM fees for customers of minority-owned banks but not for white-owned banks.

raw.headline: Judge tosses racial bias suit against Citi over ATM fee waivers
raw.summary: The lawsuit accused the New York City-based bank of “unabashed racial discrimination” for waiving ATM fees for customers of minority-owned banks but not for white-owned banks.
